snippet: The bodes, four of them hidden in a freezer, were found in a home in Louchats, a rural village in southern France.
abstract: Police find bodies of five babies in house in southern France after man discovers one in cooler bag and calls police.
lead_paragraph: The bodes, four of them hidden in a freezer, were found in a home in Louchats, a rural village in southern France.

headline.main: 5 Babies Found Dead in French Village
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; France: 5 Babies’ Bodies Found in House
